description: A Flutter widget defining a styled card component with optional tap interaction and customizable padding, consistent with the Ocean theme.

classes.name: OceanCard
classes.description: A customized Flutter widget representing a rounded card with optional tap gesture and padding, styled to match the Ocean theme.

methods.name: OceanCard
methods.description: Constructor for OceanCard widget, allowing optional tap callback, child widget, and adjustable padding.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for OceanCard, wrapping content in a Card with optional InkWell for tap interactions.

calls: InkWell(borderRadius: BorderRadius.circular(14), onTap: onTap, child: card)
